title: Patch 7.24 size
body:
Hey, Hi.
Is patch 7.24 3.3 GB in size?

replies.body: The patch is usually around 300-400 mb IIRC, but I do know some players have been seeing this weird bug with the file sizes.

It's the same for me. I was surprised but..after letting it download for a few minutes, it skipped to 2.5gb...let's hope it keeps skipping and it's only a small sized patch because I really hate these endless 6545454GB updates although all they did was add 3 skins, change some portraits and adjust some champions which looks like a sensible 300-500mb update at most..

UPDATE: It looks like the 3gb number is a fake! It just keeps skipping and skipping, it's much smaller than it looks like. Gladly.

Hii! 
Do u know how big the Patch really is?
It would help me much =)
It says my ETA is 1300+ minutes, that's over a day... Tell me it's not true

It's a bug, IIRC it's something about how the patcher includes files it is deleting/changing in this figure but these aren't downloaded, so the download size is always much smaller. This patch is actually around 380 MB

> [{quoted}](name=RabihPuncake,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2GMF3Kyp,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-12-06T04:05:06.678+0000)
>
> Hey, Hi.
> Is patch 7.24 3.3 GB in size?

yes i got 3.3 gb too idk its was too big
